attributes.action: Release all remand prisoners due to Covid-19 virus
attributes.additional_details: Due to the real risk of prisoners being in a confined spaces they are at a higher risk of catching this deadly disease and have not been guilty of any offences.
attributes.background: To release all remand prisoners who have not been found guilty of any offences and are presumed innocent.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305604

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
